text.page:
519
096-260a @#/ /dkon chog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpal rnal 'byor gyi rgyud kyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha de bzhin gshegs pa rigs lnga 'khor dang bcas pa/ lha sum cu rtsa bdun gyi bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan rnam par snang mdzad rgyal ba mi bskyod pa/ / rin chen 'byung ldan 'od dpag med dang don yod grub/ /rigs lnga bde gshegs rnams kyi bkra shis gang yod pa/ /bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bkra shis shog /rdo rje sems ma dang ni rin chen sems ma dang / /chos kyi sems ma dang ni

520
096-260b las kyi sems mar bcas/ /bcom ldan yum mchog rnams kyi bkra shis gang yod pa/ /bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bkra shis shog /rdo rje sems dpa' dang ni rdo rje rgyal po dang / /rdo rje chags pa dang ni rdo rje legs par bcas/ /bcom ldan mi bskyod 'khor gyi bkra shis gang yod pa/ /bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bkra shis shog /rdo rje rin chen dang ni rdo rje gzi brjid dang / /rdo rje rgyal mtshan dang ni rdo rje bzhad par bcas/ /bcom ldan rin 'byung 'khor gyi bkra shis gang yod pa/ /bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bkra shis shog /rdo rje chos rab dang ni rdo rje rnon po dang / /rdo rje 'khor lo dang ni rdo rje smra bar bcas/ /bcom ldan snang mtha'i 'khor gyi bkra shis gang yod pa/ /bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bkra shis shog /rdo rje las rab dang rdo rje rdo rje srung ba dang / /rdo rje gnod sbyin dang ni rdo rje khu tshur bcas/ /bcom ldan don grub 'khor gyi 'khor gyi bkra shis gang yod pa/ /bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bkra shis shog /lha mo sgeg mo dang ni lha mo phreng ba ma/ / lha mo glu ma dang ni lha mo gar mar bcas/ /nang gi mchod pa'i lha mo'i bkra shis gang yod pa/ /bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bkra shis shog /lha mo bdug spos ma dang lha mo me tog ma/ /lha mo mar me ma dang lha mo dra mar bcas/ /phyi yi mchod pa'i lha mo'i bkra shis gang yod pa/ /bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bkra shis shog /sgo ba lcags kyu ma dang sgo ba zhags pa dang / /sgo ba lcags sgrog ma dang sgo ba dril bur bcas/ /bcom ldan sgo srung rnams kyi bkra shis gang yod pa/ /bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bkra shis shog /dpal rnal 'byor gyi rgyud kyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha/ de bzhin gshegs pa rigs lnga 'khor dang bcas pa lha sum cu rtsa bdun gyi bkra shis tshigs su bcad pa rdzogs s+ho// //
